data.content:
Component: Deal
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Represents a single deal or promotion to be displayed within the Deals component.

Field: DealTitle
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Title of the deal.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Examples: “20% Off Electronics”
- No HTML or formatting

Field: DealDescription
Type: Multi-Line Text
Description: Detailed description of the deal.
Usage Rules:
- Can include multiple lines
- Should clearly explain the offer
- Avoid unsupported markup

Field: DealCtaLink
Type: General Link
Description: Call-to-action link for the deal.
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Optional but recommended
- Link text should clearly indicate action (e.g., “Shop Now”)

Field: OfferText
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Highlight or short label for the deal.
Usage Rules:
- Examples: “Limited Time Offer”, “Buy One Get One Free”
- Short, concise, no formatting

Field: DealValidity
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Validity or expiration information for the deal.
Usage Rules:
- Optional field
- Examples: “Valid until Feb 28, 2026”
- No HTML or formatting

Placement Rules:
- Only used within the Deals component
- Each Deal item corresponds to one record under the Deals section
- Layout should be visually consistent

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- All text and links should be concise and user-friendly
- Avoid placeholder or fake content

Component: Deals
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a section of multiple deals or promotions. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, homepage, landing pages, or promotional sections).

Field: Title
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Main heading for the deals section.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Examples: “Current Deals”, “Exclusive Offers”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: Description
Type: Multi-Line Text
Description: Section-level descriptive content providing context for the deals.
Usage Rules:
- Can include multiple lines
- Keep text concise and relevant
- Avoid unsupported markup

Placement Rules:
- Can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include homepage, landing pages, or promotional sections
- Layout should be consistent and visually appealing

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder text
- Under the hood, this component is connected to multiple Deal items

Component: Feature
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Represents a single feature item displayed within the Features component.

Field: FeatureImage
Type: Image
Description: Main image representing the feature.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: FeatureImageDark
Type: Image
Description: Alternate image for dark backgrounds.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text
- Used when the feature section has a dark background

Field: FeatureTitle
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Title of the feature.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Examples: “Fast Delivery”, “24/7 Support”
- No HTML or formatting

Field: FeatureDescription
Type: Multi-Line Text
Description: Detailed description of the feature.
Usage Rules:
- Can include multiple lines
- Clear, concise, and relevant
- Avoid unsupported markup

Field: FeatureLink
Type: General Link
Description: Optional link to learn more about the feature.
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Optional field
- Link text should clearly indicate action (e.g., “Learn More”)

Placement Rules:
- Only used within the Features component
- Each Feature item corresponds to one record under the Features section
- Layout should be visually consistent

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- All text, links, and images should be concise and user-friendly
- Avoid placeholder or fake content

Component: Features
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a section of features or highlights. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, homepage sections, landing pages, or content areas).

Field: Title
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Main heading for the features section.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Examples: “Our Key Features”, “Why Choose Us”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: Description
Type: Multi-Line Text
Description: Section-level description providing context for the features.
Usage Rules:
- Can include multiple lines
- Keep text concise and clear
- Avoid unsupported markup

Placement Rules:
- Can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include homepage sections, landing pages, or content areas
- Layout should be visually consistent

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder text
- Under the hood, this component is connected to multiple Feature items

Component: Footer
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Defines branding, descriptive text, legal information, navigation links and socials displayed in the website footer.

Field: Logo
Type: Image
Description: Primary footer logo image.
Usage Rules:
- Must be an image only
- Suitable for light backgrounds
- No embedded text or captions

Field: LogoDark
Type: Image
Description: Alternate footer logo for dark backgrounds.
Usage Rules:
- Must contrast clearly with dark UI
- Used when footer background is dark

Field: Description
Type: RichText
Description: Short descriptive text about the company or website.
Usage Rules:
- 1 to 3 sentences
- Informational, not marketing-heavy
- Basic formatting allowed
- No long paragraphs

Field: CopyrightText
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Legal copyright notice.
Usage Rules:
- One line only
- No HTML
- Example format: © {Year} {Company Name}. All rights reserved.

Field: PolicyText
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the Privacy Policy page.
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Link text should be “Privacy Policy”

Field: TermsText
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the Terms and Conditions page.
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Link text should be “Terms & Conditions” or “Terms of Use”

Field: CookiesText
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the Cookies Policy page.
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Link text should be “Cookie Policy”

Field: ContactText
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the Contact or Support page.
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Link text should be “Contact Us” or similar

Field: TitleOne
Type: General Link
Description: Footer navigation link.
Usage Rules:
- Single link only
- Short descriptive label

Field: TitleTwo
Type: General Link
Description: Footer navigation link.
Usage Rules:
- Single link only
- Short descriptive label

Field: TitleThree
Type: General Link
Description: Footer navigation link.
Usage Rules:
- Single link only
- Short descriptive label

Field: TitleFour
Type: General Link
Description: Footer navigation link.
Usage Rules:
- Single link only
- Short descriptive label

Field: TitleFive
Type: General Link
Description: Footer navigation link.
Usage Rules:
- Single link only
- Short descriptive label

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder URLs unless instructed
- Avoid duplicate links across footer fields
- Footer content must remain concise and non-redundant

Component: HeaderExtended
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays the website header with branding and contact links. This component is designed to be placed at the top of pages or inside a layout placeholder.

Field: LogoLight
Type: Image
Description: Primary header logo for light backgrounds.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image only
- Suitable for light backgrounds
- No embedded text

Field: LogoDark
Type: Image
Description: Alternate header logo for dark backgrounds.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image only
- Suitable for dark or high-contrast backgrounds
- No embedded text

Field: PhoneLink
Type: General Link
Description: Link for the phone number (click-to-call functionality).
Usage Rules:
- Use `tel:` format for internal linking
- Must be a valid phone number
- Optional field if not applicable

Field: MailLink
Type: General Link
Description: Link for the email address (click-to-email functionality).
Usage Rules:
- Use `mailto:` format for internal linking
- Must be a valid email address
- Optional field if not applicable

Placement Rules:
- Typically placed at the top of pages
- Can be inserted into a header placeholder
- Can coexist with navigation or other header components

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder images, phone numbers, or email addresses
- All links must be functional and correctly formatted

Component: HeroBanner
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a hero section with an image or video, titles, description, and call-to-action links. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, homepage, landing page, or content sections).

Field: Image
Type: Image
Description: Main visual for the hero banner.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Must be relevant to the banner content
- No embedded text where possible

Field: Video
Type: File
Description: Optional video for the hero banner.
Usage Rules:
- Supported video format only
- Optional field
- Video should complement or replace the image

Field: Title
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Main heading of the hero banner.
Usage Rules:
- Short and impactful
- Example: “Welcome to Our New Collection”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: Description
Type: RichText
Description: Detailed content or message for the hero banner.
Usage Rules:
- Can include basic formatting (paragraphs, bold, links)
- Keep text concise and relevant
- Avoid scripts or embedded media

Field: CtaLink
Type: General Link
Description: Primary call-to-action link.
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Optional but recommended
- Link text should clearly indicate the action (e.g., “Shop Now”, “Learn More”)

Field: SecondaryCtaLink
Type: General Link
Description: Optional secondary call-to-action link.
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Optional field
- Link text should provide a secondary action or alternative (e.g., “View Collection”, “Subscribe”)

Placement Rules:
- Can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include homepage banners or hero sections of landing pages
- Image or video should be visually prominent

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder media or links unless instructed
- Ensure visual and textual content is clear, concise, and aligned with branding

Component: Image
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a single image with an optional link and caption. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, content sections, banners, or composite components).

Field: Image
Type: Image
Description: The visual asset displayed by the component.
Usage Rules:
- Must be an image only
- Use appropriate resolution for the placement
- Avoid embedding text inside the image where possible

Field: TargetUrl
Type: General Link
Description: Optional link applied to the image.
Usage Rules:
- Can be internal or external
- When provided, the entire image acts as a clickable link
- Open in new tab only if required

Field: ImageCaption
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Short caption or label associated with the image.
Usage Rules:
- Optional field
- Single line only
- Used for descriptive or contextual text
- No HTML or formatting

Placement Rules:
- This component can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include content areas, banners, cards, and layout containers

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder images or URLs unless instructed
- Image caption should not duplicate surrounding content

Component: Link
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Represents a single navigational or action link. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, LinkList, Footer, Header, or content sections).

Field: Link
Type: General Link
Description: Defines the destination and label for the link.
Usage Rules:
- Can be an internal or external URL
- Link text must be clear and descriptive
- Avoid generic labels like “Click here”
- Open in new tab only when required

Placement Rules:
- This component can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common parent components include LinkList, Footer, and layout containers
- Multiple Link components can be used together to form a list

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field type strictly
- Do not generate placeholder or fake URLs
- Ensure link purpose is clear from the link text

Component: LinkList
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a list of navigation or related links under a single title. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, Footer, Sidebar, or Content sections).

Field: Title
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Title or heading for the group of links.
Usage Rules:
- Short text only
- Used as a section label
- Examples: “Quick Links”, “Resources”, “Explore”
- No HTML, formatting, or line breaks

Placement Rules:
- This component can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include Footer, Sidebar, and layout containers
- Intended to group multiple link items visually

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field type strictly
- Title must be meaningful and concise
- Do not generate placeholder text unless instructed

Component: NavigationIcons
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays key navigation action icons (such as Checkout, Account, and Wishlist) for quick access. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, header, sidebar, or navigation bars).

Field: CheckoutPage
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the Checkout page.
Usage Rules:
- Internal URL only
- Represents the checkout/cart action
- Link should be functional and correctly routed

Field: AccountPage
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the User Account or Profile page.
Usage Rules:
- Internal URL only
- Represents login, profile, or account management
- Link text should be clear for users

Field: WishlistPage
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the Wishlist or Saved Items page.
Usage Rules:
- Internal URL only
- Represents wishlist functionality
- Link text should be clear for users

Placement Rules:
- This component can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include Header, Navigation Bars, or Sidebar
- Icons should be visually identifiable and consistent with UX guidelines

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder URLs
- Only include provided icons/links; optional icons may remain empty
- Avoid duplicate links across different navigation components

Component: Offer
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Represents a single promotional offer to be displayed within the Offers component.

Field: OfferText
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Text describing the offer.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Examples: “Free Shipping”, “20% Off Today”
- No HTML or formatting

Placement Rules:
- Only used within the Offers component
- Each Offer item corresponds to one Treelist entry
- Ensure visual and textual consistency

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Text should be concise, clear, and user-friendly
- Avoid placeholder or fake content

Component: Offers
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a list of promotional offers or deals. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, homepage, sidebar, or promotional sections).

Field: Offers
Type: Treelist
Description: Selection of Offer items to display.
Usage Rules:
- Must select one or more Offer items from Sitecore
- Only approved or published Offer items should be included
- Each selected item should follow the Offer template

Placement Rules:
- Can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include homepage banners, promotional sections, or sidebars
- Layout should be consistent and visually appealing

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not include placeholder offers

Component: Promo
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays promotional content with images, titles, descriptions, and a call-to-action link. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, homepage sections, banners, or content areas).

Field: PromoImageOne
Type: Image
Description: First promotional image.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Relevant to the promotion
- No embedded text

Field: PromoImageTwo
Type: Image
Description: Second promotional image.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Relevant to the promotion
- No embedded text

Field: PromoImageThree
Type: Image
Description: Third promotional image.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: PromoTitle
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Main title of the promotion.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Example: “Spring Sale 2026”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: PromoSubTitle
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Optional subtitle providing additional context.
Usage Rules:
- Short, optional text
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: PromoDescription
Type: RichText
Description: Detailed description or promotional message.
Usage Rules:
- Can include basic formatting (paragraphs, bold, links)
- Keep text concise and focused
- Avoid scripts or embedded media

Field: PromoMoreInfo
Type: General Link
Description: Call-to-action link for more information.
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Optional but recommended
- Link text should be clear (e.g., “Learn More”, “Shop Now”)

Placement Rules:
- Can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include homepage banners, promotional sections, or marketing areas

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder images, URLs, or promotional text unless instructed
- Ensure all content is relevant, concise, and visually compatible

Component: Review
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Represents a single review/testimonial item to be displayed within the Reviews component.

Field: Avatar
Type: Image
Description: Reviewer’s avatar or profile picture.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: ReviewerName
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Name of the reviewer.
Usage Rules:
- Short and readable
- Examples: “John Doe”, “Jane Smith”
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Caption
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Short caption for the review.
Usage Rules:
- Optional field
- Examples: “Verified Buyer”, “5-Star Rating”
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Description
Type: Multi-Line Text
Description: Detailed review content from the reviewer.
Usage Rules:
- Multiple lines allowed
- Text should be clear, concise, and relevant
- Avoid HTML or unsupported markup

Field: Rating
Type: Number
Description: Numeric rating associated with the review.
Usage Rules:
- Typical range: 1–5
- Optional field if not provided
- Must be a valid numeric value

Field: ReviewImage
Type: Image
Description: Optional image associated with the review (e.g., product photo).
Usage Rules:
- Optional field
- High-quality image
- No embedded text

Placement Rules:
- Only used within the Reviews component
- Each Single Review item corresponds to one Treelist entry
- Layout should be consistent and visually appealing

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- All text and images should be appropriate and user-friendly
- Avoid placeholder or fake content

Component: Reviews
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a curated list of reviews or testimonials. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, homepage sections, product pages, or content areas).

Field: Reviews
Type: Treelist
Description: Selection of Single Review items to display.
Usage Rules:
- Must select one or more Single Review items from Sitecore
- Only approved or published review items should be included
- Each selected item should follow the Single Review template

Field: Title
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Main heading for the reviews section.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Examples: “Customer Reviews”, “What Our Users Say”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: Eyebrow
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Optional small heading or contextual label above the title.
Usage Rules:
- Short, optional text
- Examples: “Testimonials”, “Feedback”
- No HTML or line breaks

Placement Rules:
- Can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include homepage, product pages, or promotional sections
- Ensure spacing and alignment are consistent with surrounding content

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not include placeholder reviews
- Titles and Eyebrows should be concise and user-friendly

Component: RichText
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays formatted textual content. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, content sections, layouts, or composite components).

Field: Text
Type: RichText
Description: Main formatted content displayed by the component.
Usage Rules:
- Supports basic formatting (paragraphs, lists, bold, links)
- Content should be clear, readable, and well-structured
- Avoid excessive formatting or inline styles
- Keep content relevant to the surrounding component context

Placement Rules:
- This component can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include content areas, cards, columns, and layout containers

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field type strictly
- Do not include scripts, embedded media, or unsupported markup
- Avoid overly long content unless explicitly required
- Do not generate placeholder or filler text unless instructed

Component: SectionWrapper
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Serves as a content container or section wrapper with a title, description, and optional link. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, homepage sections, landing pages, or content areas).

Field: Title
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Main heading for the section.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Examples: “Featured Products”, “Latest News”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: Description
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Short descriptive text providing context for the section.
Usage Rules:
- Concise and clear
- Optional field if not needed
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Link
Type: General Link
Description: Optional link associated with the section (e.g., “View All”, “Learn More”).
Usage Rules:
- Internal or external URL
- Optional field
- Link text should clearly indicate the action

Placement Rules:
- Can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include content sections, cards, or layout containers

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder text or links
- Ensure all text is concise and user-friendly

Component: SocialFeed
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a social media feed with multiple images and captions. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, homepage sections, sidebars, or content areas).

Field: Eyebrow
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Small contextual label above the heading.
Usage Rules:
- Short, optional text
- Examples: “From Instagram”, “Our Social Feed”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: Heading
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Main title for the social feed section.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Examples: “Latest Posts”, “Social Highlights”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: Image1
Type: Image
Description: First image in the feed.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: Image2
Type: Image
Description: Second image in the feed.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: Image3
Type: Image
Description: Third image in the feed.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: Image4
Type: Image
Description: Fourth image in the feed.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: Image5
Type: Image
Description: Fifth image in the feed.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: Image6
Type: Image
Description: Sixth image in the feed.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: Image7
Type: Image
Description: Seventh image in the feed.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: Image8
Type: Image
Description: Eighth image in the feed.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: Image9
Type: Image
Description: Ninth image in the feed.
Usage Rules:
- High-quality image
- Optional field
- No embedded text

Field: Caption1
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Caption for Image1.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Optional
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Caption2
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Caption for Image2.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Optional
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Caption3
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Caption for Image3.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Optional
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Caption4
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Caption for Image4.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Optional
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Caption5
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Caption for Image5.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Optional
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Caption6
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Caption for Image6.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Optional
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Caption7
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Caption for Image7.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Optional
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Caption8
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Caption for Image8.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Optional
- No HTML or formatting

Field: Caption9
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Caption for Image9.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Optional
- No HTML or formatting

Placement Rules:
- Can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include homepage sections or sidebars
- Images should be visually aligned and consistent in size

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder images or captions unless instructed
- Ensure captions are clear and relevant to the corresponding images

Component: SocialFollow
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a group of social media follow links. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, a footer or header).

Field: SocialTitle
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Title or label displayed above or next to the social links.
Usage Rules:
- Short text only
- Examples: “Follow Us”, “Connect With Us”
- No HTML or formatting

Field: FacebookLink
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the official Facebook page.
Usage Rules:
- External URL only
- Link text should be “Facebook”
- Do not use personal profiles

Field: YoutubeLink
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the official YouTube channel.
Usage Rules:
- External URL only
- Link text should be “YouTube”
- Must point to a channel or brand page

Field: InstagramLink
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the official Instagram profile.
Usage Rules:
- External URL only
- Link text should be “Instagram”

Field: TwitterLink
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the official Twitter / X profile.
Usage Rules:
- External URL only
- Link text should be “Twitter” or “X”
- Use brand account only

Field: LinkedinLink
Type: General Link
Description: Link to the official LinkedIn company page.
Usage Rules:
- External URL only
- Link text should be “LinkedIn”

Placement Rules:
- This component can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include Footer and Header components
- Social links should be optional; fields may be empty if not applicable

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder or fake social URLs
- Only include platforms that are provided
- Avoid duplicate links across social fields

Component: Subscribe
Platform: Sitecore
Purpose: Displays a subscription form with title, button, helper text, and consent information. This component is designed to be placed inside a placeholder of another component (for example, footer, sidebar, or content sections).

Field: Title
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Main heading or title for the subscription form.
Usage Rules:
- Short and descriptive
- Examples: “Subscribe to Our Newsletter”, “Join Our Mailing List”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: ButtonText
Type: Single-Line Text
Description: Text displayed on the submit button.
Usage Rules:
- Short, action-oriented text
- Examples: “Subscribe”, “Sign Up”
- No HTML or line breaks

Field: HelperText
Type: RichText
Description: Additional instructions or guidance for the user.
Usage Rules:
- Can include basic formatting (paragraphs, bold, links)
- Keep content concise and relevant
- Do not include scripts or embedded media

Field: ConsentText
Type: RichText
Description: Text to inform users about consent, privacy, or legal requirements.
Usage Rules:
- Can include basic formatting
- Should clearly explain how user data will be used
- Required for GDPR/other compliance
- Keep text clear and concise

Placement Rules:
- This component can be inserted into placeholders of other components
- Common placements include Footer, Sidebar, and dedicated content sections

Global Rules:
- Respect Sitecore field types strictly
- Do not generate placeholder text or fake consent information
- Ensure all text is user-friendly and clear
